Hissab is a simple and intuitive natural language calculator, unit-convertor and productivity application. 

Hissab is:
Simple & Intuitive
Using hissab feels completely natural. There is no learning curve or complex documentation needed. To perform any calculation, simply type the expression and get instant answers 

Powerful & smart
From basic calculations to advanced operations, it can do it all. It supports a wide range of operations, calculations and can compute complex expressions as you type.

For Everyone & Everyday use
Hissab is a day to day productivity application. Whether you are or a student or a professional, it is useful for everyone.

What can it do?
- All basic mathematical operations like add, subtract, multiply, divide, power etc
- Unit conversion for Length, Volume, Weight, Area, Temperature, computer memory, time and many more.
- Date, time and timezone calculations
- Percentage operations
- Bit manipulations and number systems line Decimal, binary, octal and hexadecimal
